description.oldValue:
Today when there is a broadly impacting issue that affects multiple services across the Microsoft 365 services, Microsoft will create a single incident usually under Microsoft 365 Suite. In the message details of this incident, we will call out specific services impacted with their overall current state.
GA date: May CY2022
description.newValue: Today when there is a broadly impacting issue that affects multiple services across the Microsoft 365 services, Microsoft will create a single incident usually under Microsoft 365 Suite. In the message details of this incident, we will call out specific services impacted with their overall current state.
